description: The 2008 United States Presidential Election was a historic and defining moment in the country’s history.  After enduring several years of war and economic recession, the American people were ready to move on to a brighter path. A little known US Senator from Chicago would step up to lead them to that path.  His name was Barack Obama.  Despite very public concerns that his race, age and multitude of other factors would prevent him from winning the Presidency, Obama inspired America and steamrolled his way to becoming the 44th  President of the USA. This book provides a detailed biography and account of the election with a mantra of Change.  Download our ebook  today and get the full story and secrets of Obama’s campaign.
